description: Punishment. Draw vital energy from your foes to gain life force and grant boons to nearby allies. Gain additional life force per target struck. Convert a boon on affected enemies to torment.

name: Engage Photon Forge
description: Activate your Photon Forge, gaining access to new skills. Generate heat while Photon Forge is active. Take damage if you overheat. Disables use of kits for a short duration.

traited_facts.description: Your next attack sets the target on fire.

name: Beastmode
description: Meld with your pet.

name: Razorclaw's Rage
description:
Legendary Renegade. Summon Centurion Jas Razorclaw from the Mists to strike nearby enemies and enhance the attacks of your allies.

Band Together. After using this skill, your next Legendary Renegade skill activates instantly and is enhanced. When this skill is enhanced it also inflicts torment on enemies that it strikes.

name: Fracturing Strike

facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

description: Dual Attack. Call a meteor from the sky that crashes to the ground, creating an eruption of magma.

description: Final Charge. Gain significant health. Grant boons to yourself and allies in front of and around you.

name: Mantra of Liberation

Mantra. Echo remnants of an ancient pamphlet from Vabbi that urged Elonians to freedom. Grant stability and resolution to allies while breaking stun.
The final charge of this skill is more powerful.

name: Deadeye's Mark
description:
Mark a target, causing your initiative attacks to generate malice when they hit or critically hit your mark. Lose malice when the mark ends or when this skill is recast on a new target.
Malice is only gained once per skill use.
